about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know my journey
about.description: Hi! I'm Pablo Gomes, a Full Stack developer dedicated to creating digital experiences that are as functional as they are impactful.
about.journey: Just over a year ago I started my programming journey, exploring technologies like TypeScript, React, Node.js, MySQL and the classic trio HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
about.education: Currently, I'm studying Systems Analysis and Development at UNIP and I keep challenging myself with projects that make me learn and evolve every day.
